description: Is your Thanksgiving menu set? If not, here is the best Thanksgiving cocktail recipe to add to it. This&nbsp;Mulled Red Wine Sangria is perfect for the holiday season because it's festive and delicious. It can be served warm or cold, so you don't have to worry about whether your guests want something hot or cold.
keywords: Mulled Red Wine Sangria Cocktail Recipe
How To Mulled Red Wine Sangria
name: Mulled Red Wine Sangria

recipeInstructions.name: Combine wine, juice, brandy, and sugar in a medium saucepan over low heat and heat until the sugar has melted.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine wine, juice, brandy, and sugar in a medium saucepan over low heat and heat until the sugar has melted.

recipeInstructions.name: Add the orange and lemon slices and let simmer for 5 minutes. Serve in heat-resistant glasses.
recipeInstructions.text: Add the orange and lemon slices and let simmer for 5 minutes. Serve in heat-resistant glasses.
